column6: Stark Industries is in lockdown as Tony 2.0 forcibly uploads everyone inside to his purgatorial virtual StarkWorld.  His most recent victim?  Pepper Potts.  It's up to Rhodey â€" suited up in a prototype War Machine armor â€" to save the day.  It's a fight Rhodey can't win, but can't afford to lose â€" at least not until Pepper finds Tony and everyone finds out what it's going to cost to get a real mind of its virtual prison. Parental Advisory ...$3.99
